bind.relevant: ( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p') and (selected( ../../u_product ,'material') or selected( ../../u_product ,'sku') or selected( ../../u_product ,'packaging') or selected( ../../u_product ,'state'))

(( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod ='product' and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))) or (( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and selected( ../../u_product ,'material')) and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))

(( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod ='product' and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))) or (( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and selected( ../../u_product ,'sku')) and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))

(( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod ='product' and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))) or (( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and selected( ../../u_product ,'quality')) and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))

(( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod ='product' and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))) or (( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and selected( ../../u_product ,'organic')) and ( ../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or ../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or ../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or ../sel_prod_cat ='medicine' or ../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'))

( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier') or ( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier' and /products/gr_act/s_prod ='product') or ( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier') or ( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_rate ='rate')

bind.calculate: if(( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier' ) or ( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_rate ='rate' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product'),selected-at( /products/s_repeat/ser_product , position(..)-1),if( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier',pulldata('supplier','product_id','supplier_id', /products/s_repeat/ser_manufacturer ),'empty'))

if( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier', /products/s_repeat/ser_product , if( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_rate ='rate' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product',pulldata('rate','product_id','rate_id', ../ser_rate ),if( /products/gr_act/action ='search_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier',pulldata('rate','product_id','rate_id', /products/s_repeat/search_rate ),'')))

if( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product' ,pulldata('product','product','product_id', /products/s_repeat/ser_product ),if( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_rate ='rate', pulldata('rate','product_name','rate_id', ../ser_rate ),if( /products/gr_act/action ='search_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier',pulldata('rate','product_name','rate_id', /products/s_repeat/search_rate ),'')))

if( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier' and /products/gr_act/s_prod !='product' ,pulldata('product','category','product_id', /products/s_repeat/ser_product ),if( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and /products/gr_act/s_rate ='rate', pulldata('rate','category','rate_id', ../ser_rate ),if( /products/gr_act/action ='search_p' and /products/gr_act/s_supp ='supplier', pulldata('rate','category','rate_id', /products/s_repeat/search_rate ),'')))

bind.relevant: ( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p' and ( ../../single_category ='minerals' or ../../single_category ='cip-solution' or ../../single_category ='vanda' or ../../single_category ='medicine' or ../../single_category ='hygiene' or ../../single_category ='other')) or ( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p' and (selected( ../../rate_information ,'rate')) and ( ../../single_category ='minerals' or ../../single_category ='cip-solution' or ../../single_category ='vanda' or ../../single_category ='medicine' or ../../single_category ='hygiene' or ../../single_category ='other'))

bind.calculate: if( ../rate !='' and ( ../../single_category ='minerals' or ../../single_category ='cip-solution' or ../../single_category ='vanda' or ../../single_category ='medicine' or ../../single_category ='hygiene' or ../../single_category ='other'), ../rate div ../sku_no ,if( ../rate ='', ../../urate ,if( ../rate !='' and ../../single_category ='machines', ../rate ,'')))

input.label: 1) To setup product, pick NEW 2) To change product, pick UPDATE 3) To Search product, pick SEARCH
1) Pick Product To setup new Product. 2) Pick Supplier To add supplier, manufacturer and rate

1) Pick Product to for product info 2) Pick Supplier for supplier and rate info

itemset.nodeset: instance('product_subcat')/root/item[if( /products/gr_act/action ='new_p', category_filter= current()/../sel_prod_cat , if(( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p') and ( current()/../sel_prod_cat =''),category_filter= current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ,if(( /products/gr_act/action ='update_p') and ( current()/../sel_prod_cat !=''),category_filter= current()/../sel_prod_cat ,'')))]

input.label: Material: SKU: Packaging: State:

itemset.nodeset: instance('Packaging')/root/item[if( current()/../prod_state ='solid' or current()/../prod_state ='powder' or current()/../prod_state ='pellets',pack_filter= 'solid', if( current()/../prod_state ='liquid' or current()/../prod_state ='gel',pack_filter='liquid', if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='machines',pack_filter='machine',if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='other',pack_filter='other', if(( current()/../prod_state ='') and ( current()/../../product_search/u_prod_state ='solid' or current()/../../product_search/u_prod_state ='powder' or current()/../../product_search/u_prod_state ='pellets'),pack_filter= 'solid', if(( current()/../prod_state ='') and current()/../../product_search/u_prod_state ='liquid' or current()/../../product_search/u_prod_state ='gel',pack_filter='liquid', if(( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='') and current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ='machines',pack_filter='machine',if(( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='') and current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ='other',pack_filter='other',''))))))))]

instance('SKU')/root/item[if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='minerals' or current()/../sel_prod_cat ='vanda' or current()/../sel_prod_cat ='medicine',sku_filter= 'solid', if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or current()/../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene',sku_filter='liquid', if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='other' or current()/../sel_prod_cat ='machines' ,sku_filter='other',if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='' and ( current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ='minerals' or current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ='vanda' or current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ='medicine'),sku_filter= 'solid', if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='' and ( current()/../../product_search/u_prod_cat ='cip-solution' or current()/../sel_prod_cat ='hygiene'),sku_filter='liquid', if( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='' and ( current()/../sel_prod_cat ='other' or current()/../sel_prod_cat ='machines') ,sku_filter='other',''))))))]
